formalText: She has four kids.
She has been in to have her arm stitched up and her stomach pumped a few times.
Nobody cares.
She wishes someone would help her.
Couple of months they've been living together for the last four and a half weeks.
Oh God, she can't believe he is gone.
She says she hate him.
She needs him to come back because she loves him. Jack The Jerk was before him feel left her to they all leave.
Everybody leaves her.
She hates them Carl was David different.
He said he loved me.
Oh, well, if he loved her, he would be here now.
She never was...she needs to get out of here.
She needs to see Carl.
Her baby was removed and taken to foster care after the ambulance responded to her home last night.
She can't I can't get to the appointments all the time.
She told him that it was tough for her to get there all the time and he was no help, asshole.
She hates him.
He was going to help her...she needs to get back to her room.
She loves to watch TV.
Carl gets pissed about her spending too much.
He was mad last night.
She  bought stuff for the house and in him to she doesn't have a job right now.
Fired from her last one.
They hated her.
She is not suicidal.
Sometimes she cuts herself to feel the pain and release it. In the past she cut too deep but got stitched up.
She has been on Depakote and Geodon and Abilify.
They suck and didn't work.
She doesn't have good results with the meds and the therapist is a jerk.
She might binge eat and spend but she doesn't drink or do drugs.
Mom died when she was 4 and her dad is a drunk.
They hate her and would never help her.
They've never helped her.
